title: Crypto Fan Won Ohio Senate Primary That Could Alter the Industry's U.S. Destiny
description: Ohio's U.S. Senate race may be the biggest congressional contest this year for the crypto industry, now pitting a digital assets booster against Sen. Sherrod Brown (D-Ohio), the sitting Senate Banking Committee chairman who has stood in the way of the development of regulatory legislation.

title: Cryptocurrency industry urges SEC for clear regulations amidst coinbase appeal
description: In a concerted effort to address the regulatory ambiguity surrounding the cryptocurrency market, major players within the industry are pressuring the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to establish definitive rules and guidelines. Led by influential entities such as Paradigm, the Crypto Council for Innovation, and the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, stakeholders are rallying behind […]

title: Surge Ahead: Top Meme Coins to Buy Before the Bitcoin Halving
description: Historically, every Bitcoin halving has catalyzed an epic rally across the crypto world, as evidenced by the 2017 and 2021 bull runs. Both were preceded by Bitcoin halving events in 2016 and 2020, respectively, and this year is no different. At the time of writing, Bitcoin has just cleared $70,000, and meme coins are as […]

title: Can Empowering Women Through AI Combat Poverty? Perspectives from a Kwara Official
description: In a compelling discourse on the global stage, Sambo Muritala, Special Adviser to the Kwara State Governor on Legal Matters, accentuated the pivotal role of Empowering Women Through AI to combat poverty and ensure food security. Addressing the 68th Session of the Commission on the Status of Women (CSW68) at the United Nations Headquarters, Muritala […]

title: Crypto hedge fund co-founder Kyle Davies unapologetic amidst scandal
description: In a recent episode of the Unchained Podcast, Kyle Davies, co-founder of the now-defunct crypto hedge fund Three Arrows Capital (3AC), displayed an unrepentant attitude towards the billions lost by investors. Despite facing criticism and legal implications, Davies remained resolute in his stance, expressing no remorse for the collapse of 3AC. Lack of remorse and […]
